task.title: Configuring Users
task.shortdesc: The includes several default users. You can customize the default users or create additional Data Collector users for increased security.

context.p: userscreatingConfigure users in the properties file for the type of authentication that you use. For example, if you use basic authentication, you configure users in the basic-realm.properties file.
To encrypt login information, you can use an md5 program such as md5 on Mac OS X or md5sum on Linux.
For Form and Basic authentication, you can encrypt the password. For example: echo -n "<password>" | md5
For Digest authentication, you can hash the combination of <username>:<realm>:<password>. For example: echo -n "<username>:<realm>:<password>" | md5

step.cmd: Modify the properties file for the type of authentication that you use.
step.info: The file is located in the following directory: <SDCinstalldir>/etc/. When the is installed as a service, the file is located in the follwing directory: /etc/sdc/.
